description.en: A captain of a pirate ship who decides to help the very people that try to commandeer it. Raised as a boy and shrouded in mystery、 she discovers she is the princess of Tycoon and the elder sister of Lenna on her journey with Bartz's party. Her friends and the memories of her family are what drive her to push on.
description.jp:
バッツたちが忍びこみ のちに協力を
得た海賊船の頭領。常に男装し 素性も
明らかではなかったが 冒険を通して
タイクーン王家の第一王女であり
レナの姉であることが判明。
亡くした家族や 仲間のため
共に苦難を乗り越えていく。

jp.text: 女だからってバカにすんなよ！
もうこれ以上……\n命が失われるのを見たくない……
海ぞくのおれが\n本当はお姫様かい\n……じょうだんきついよ！
サリサ……おれの本当の名前……

gl.text: Make fun of me for really being a woman and I'll shiver your timbers but good!
I won't stand by while more lives are lost!

desc.en:
6-HIT Thunder, Water and Wind AoE ranged BRV+HP attack
Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed targets
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies
Grants [Syldra's Blessing] for 2 turns

While [Syldra's Blessing] is active:
• Slightly raises party Max BRV overflow limit
• Triggers [Whirlpool] after every enemy turn
　∟ 2-HIT Water ranged BRV attack
　∟ Raises allies' BRV based on BRV damage dealt
　∟ Cannot initiate a Chase Sequence
　∟ (Same special effect will not stack)
desc.gl:
6-hit group Thunder Water Wind ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 2 turns special effect Syldra's Care

Slightly increases amount party's stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV, triggers Whirlpool (2-hit Water ranged BRV attack; grants allies BRV based on BRV damage dealt; no Knock Back) after enemy turn while special effect Syldra's Care active (does not stack with special effects of same name)
desc.jp:
6HIT雷水風属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
弱体効果が付与された対象に より大きなBRVダメージ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に2ACTION特殊効果「シルドラの加護」付与

特殊効果「シルドラの加護」付与中
味方全員の奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップし
敵の行動後 以下の「うずしお」が発動
2HIT水属性遠距離物理BRV攻撃
与えたBRVダメージに依存した量のBRVを
自身以外の味方全員に加算
この攻撃で吹きとばしは発生しない
（同名の特殊効果は重複しない）

desc.en:
「Waterwhirl」 use +2
Reduces mastery requirement of 「Waterwhirl」 by 1

When using 「Waterwhirl」, 「Waterwhirl+」:
- Slightly raises BRV potency
- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed targets
- Grants 「Pirate's Style」 for 6 turns
- Lowers Action Delay
- Triggers an HP attack after use

When using 「Waterwhirl」:
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

When using 「Waterwhirl+」:
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

While 「Pirate's Style」 is active:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Moderately raises total BRV potency
- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed targets

「Pirate's Style」 raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed
desc.gl:
Waterwhirl use +2

Mastery requirement for Waterwhirl to become Waterwhirl+ reduced by 1

When using Waterwhirl, Waterwhirl+:
 • Slight BRV damage boost
 • Increased BRV damage dealt to debuffed targets
 • Self: 6 turns The Pirate Way
 • Higher turn rate
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

When using Waterwhirl:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using Waterwhirl+:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

While The Pirate Way active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets)
